page.title: 03EVENTS IN SEASCALE
page.content: On Monday May 6 we had a Fun-day. It started with a parade of decorated floats and fancy_dress which went from Cross Lanes down to the car park.There were stalls on the beach. When the tide was in there was a raft race. Other activities included a cycle race and the army assault course. There was a Funfair which was on all day including two thrilling rides, the fast rotating Soul Shifter, and the Dodgems. Later, there was an, "It's a Knock-out," competition with hazards like balancing buckets of water on poles and tipping them into drums.On the beach there was a Punch and Judy show.By the Scawfell Hotel there was an entertaining B.M.X.freestyle competition.Next there was a roller skating race,then an exciting pram race.
